ActorTalk: [PlayerName], BCC has arranged your inauguration ceremony. All the vendors from the Commercial Square will participate then.
I've already reported everything I know about the Flourish Guild. Have you found anything new on your end?
I came across a printed list. Looks like it names all the businesses they're targeting.
A list? Can I have a look?
...We can't say for sure it's from the guild, but if we investigate, we might still dig up some useful leads.
I'll forward it to the proper authorities right away. Great work, [PlayerName].
Until the investigation wraps up, you're still in charge of keeping order at the square. It's a critical stage. Any problems now could be a disaster.
I was just thinking... One business alone might not be able to stand up to the guild. But what if we unite them all?
I have an idea that might stop the Flourish Guild from expanding illegally. Want to hear it, [PlayerName]?
The ceremony's about to begin. Let me know when you're ready.
They might be backed by a power like Kurono.
It's a tough situation, but this is your moment to shine as Chief Commissioner.
The Flourish Guild went too far.
Thrown right into the fire, huh.
